name: Ops KPIs
description: Measure clicks per session, time to first value, and onboarding duration to optimize operational efficiency.

prd.problemStatement: Operational efficiency depends on system usability and onboarding effectiveness. Ops KPIs identify friction points and optimization opportunities.
userStories: As a product manager, I want ops KPIs so that I can identify usability improvements
As a UX designer, I want click tracking so that I can optimize user flows
